casebody.data:
WELLS FARGO BANK, N.A.
v.
James R. FITZPATRICK et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 26, 2019 Bryan L. LeClerc, in support of the petition. J. Patrick Kennedy and David Bizar, in opposition.

The petition by the defendants James R. Fitzpatrick and Marsha A. Fitzpatrick for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 190 Conn. App. 231 , 210 A.3d 88 (2019), is denied.
